column3: Latest;Kampong Speu:------ Chinese man inspecting machinery suddenly fainted and was rushed to hospital but unfortunately was DoA. The incident occurred at about 09.45 minutes the morning of Aug. 13 2019 in Anlong Kong Village
column5: Samrong Tong District.------The victim was identified as LI HUA QING
column7: business owner of a sales and repair company in Sangkat Chom Chao
column9: Phnom Penh. .------The victim died of fainting while inspecting a machine in Anlong Kong Village
column12: Kampong Speu Province. After he collapsed people called an ambulance to the Kampong Speu referral hospital
column13: but the victim suffered a heart attack on the way.------The victim’s body has now been turned over to the Ministry of Interior’s Technical Science Department for further proceedings and waiting for the family. ------TVFB
